column1: Pinnacle Midstream to Double Midland Basin Processing Capacity | Pipeline and Gas Journal;;https://pgjonline.com/news/2023/july/pinnacle-midstream-to-double-midland-basin-processing-capacity;;Pinnacle Midstream II
column4: Energy Spectrum Capital;;Yes;;Pinnacle Midstream II expands operations in gas-rich Midland Basin
column5: constructing a 220 MMcf/d natural gas processing plant. Plans to start commercial operation in Q4 2024. Also expanding facilities in Permian Basin to reduce flaring and maximize flow assurances. Supported by Energy Spectrum Capital.

column1: BP Settles US Natural Gas Market Manipulation Case for $10.8 Million | Pipeline and Gas Journal;;https://pgjonline.com/news/2023/july/bp-settles-us-natural-gas-market-manipulation-case-for-108-million;;BP
column3: Hurricane Ike;;Yes;;BP agrees to pay $10.75 million civil penalty for manipulating natural gas markets in 2008. Settlement reached with FERC regarding actions during Hurricane Ike. BP may seek to reclaim excess payments.

column1: Pinnacle Midstream II expands operations in gas-rich Midland Basin
column2: constructing a 220 MMcf/d natural gas processing plant. Plans to start commercial operation in Q4 2024. Also expanding facilities in Permian Basin to reduce flaring and maximize flow assurances. Supported by Energy Spectrum Capital. BP agrees to pay $10.75 million civil penalty for manipulating natural gas markets in 2008. Settlement reached with FERC regarding actions during Hurricane Ike. BP may seek to reclaim excess payments.
